website_summaries.verdict: Very popular with consumers looking for an effective, affordable garage door opener.
pros: Features a PosiLock system, making it impossible for the door to be forced open
cons: Only one remote control is included in the package
Also a bit on the noisier side

customer_reviews.title: Solid garage door opener
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace a 15+ year old unit that my dad was using in his garage. He wanted to pick something that would simply bolt back up to the existing track/frame and this did exactly that. He said it fit his t-rail track that was already in place. Overall - highly recommend this door opener. Previous Chamberlain door openers have lasted 15+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far so good a month in! The unit is a little noisier than our old Overhead Door, but I don't mind. It doesn't come with an outside mountable door opener which is strange. We don't use our keys anymore because we'd just come through the garage, so that's been tricky. No one has had to climb through a window yet, but I can see that coming.
customer_reviews.author: A. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I needed. The old unit was failing and it was a simple process to just change it out with this one. Probably saved a couple hundred dollars doing it myself. This was the first time I had tried to replace a garage door opener and it went fairly smooth. If I can do it just about anybody can.
customer_reviews.author: NT

customer_reviews.title: Love my New Garage Door Openers
customer_reviews.text: I love the new garage door openers and although I did not install them myself; the installer had them in place in a relatively short time. I purchased two units to replace existing ones. These are much quieter and he was able to program both remotes to open either door. You can program up to three garage doors to open/close which I think is pretty cool. I would definitely recommend this product. Finally the units arrived five days earlier which was a great plus in getting them installed.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Peters

customer_reviews.title: Lacking fine adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Went together as expected. Problem is they don't give you controls to increase the amount of down strength. When my door closes, the opener needs to go a touch more to put the top of the door flush. If I attempt to increase the distance a bit more, the door just reopens. Guess it is close enough, but would prefer it to push a tad more.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Love the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I thought it might be as the belt openers are quieter over chain openers. It is a welcomed asset to have in place and easily lifts and closes my garage door. Manual opening was no longer an option with the new replacement doors as the newer ones have no outside handles.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I installed in an afternoon. The system is quiet and very responsive. i have a screw dive unit on the adjacent door, and this Chamberlain unit is as quiet and and just as fast.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Easy to install, only took a couple hours. Everything works great accept for the vehicle remote that it came with I couldn't get to work but I had a universal anyways to control 2 doors. Nice and quiet opener.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install for a handyman
customer_reviews.text: easy to install for a handyman, comes with very easy to read and not too lengthy instructions, I would buy again, works great, just don't like that the track came in several pieces but seems to be OK when assembled
customer_reviews.author: Al Warling

customer_reviews.title: Great No Frills Door Opener !!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a decent chain drive no frills garage door opener. Well constructed; instructions were easy to follow. Very easy to program. Open and close limit switches were super easy to set. Very quiet for a chain drive unit. I would not hesitate in buying another unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love the new opener
customer_reviews.text: Love the new opener. Also got the compatibility bridge so my cars both can open the garage now. Installed this single handedly too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Williams

customer_reviews.title: Work Good
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know if it's easy to install, I paid to install it, but I can say it's noisy
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great opener. Easily installed on old track and chain drive.
customer_reviews.author: David Briggs

customer_reviews.title: The installation instructions are not great, but luckily my husband is an engineer and ...
customer_reviews.text: The installation instructions are not great, but luckily my husband is an engineer and figured it out. As far as the actual product, it works well. Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty quiet in comparing it to my previous opener and ...
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively simple to set up, considering it was my first time installing a garage door opener. It's been running without any issues since I installed it about a month ago. It's pretty quiet in comparing it to my previous opener and others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money!!
customer_reviews.text: Awe full. Some screws were not in the package Terrible instruction Hired a contractor to put it up He had a very difficult time.. It took him 2 days Waste of time and money What a mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: TERI D.

customer_reviews.title: Do it yourself garage door
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I expected has a little more power than I thought it would have and it also has a light on it everything is very good quality very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jared Stegall

customer_reviews.title: A nice unit, quiet and smooth for my 10 foot ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice unit, quiet and smooth for my 10 foot tall garage door. I also bought the extension necessary to install this unit for a 10 foot tall garage door. I plan to buy another one for my other garage door. I installed this unit as a DIY installation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ... than the old type opener and that more things like mounting brackets that hold up the housing were included
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this was easier to install than the old type opener and that more things like mounting brackets that hold up the housing were included. Working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: bought it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic door opener. some of directions a little vagu. but i figured it out works very good
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value the plastic wheel for the cable needs to be steel with bearings
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Chamberlain Garage Door
customer_reviews.text: Have had this installed for several months and it works great. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: holycow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, surprisingly quite, didn't expect that. great amazon price
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Arrived quickly. Had Chamberlain before and replaced with new one.
customer_reviews.author: susand

customer_reviews.title: Good price, easy to install and strong
customer_reviews.text: Good price , easy to install and strong . Denise's husband John
customer_reviews.author: DENISE S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great nice features
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to install. Love the light funtion on switch. Works great. So does my old Chamberlain that came on one of two garage doors with my new home.
customer_reviews.author: K buggy

customer_reviews.title: Great opener. My door was 9"
customer_reviews.text: Great opener. My door was 9", so had to order an 8" extension chain, but worked perfectly. Very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Txhotme

customer_reviews.title: It serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but i wish the hand held opener would support two garage door openers.
customer_reviews.author: PrecioustoHim

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic and simple to install! Although I wish it came with a second remote, it doesn't work with the opener built into my car but that's correctable.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey W. Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat this unit for the price. Does exactly what it is supposed to do..
customer_reviews.author: W. Dini

customer_reviews.title: Beam me up Scotty!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not real clear, but we got it installed and working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur C. Carruth

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: A lot more smoother opening and closing than my old door. Nice product but a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: John Hunter

customer_reviews.title: it works like a gem
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my father. it works like a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sieveking

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: OKAY OPENER FOR THE PRICE, Easy to install, nice basic opener
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Successful installation and smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this replacement for a 20+ year old Crawford Garage Door Opener. Everything needed for installation (except tools) was included in the box. Took awhile for the mechanism to "learn" the coding for the opener and keypad (purchased separately). Eventually called customer service, was told the instruction sheet was outdated for this model. But they provided the needed information and we were good to go. I was concerned that the one-half horsepower would be too strong for the door (the Crawford was one-third) but it is opening and closing the door smoothly and quietly. Hope it lasts another 20 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: Great door opener. Very easy to install and extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kev and Deb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Made in Mexico instead of China. I don't buy any China.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: when opening light is blinking appears to have a short
customer_reviews.author: John Winkler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. The set-up mode to control travel up/down was in particular user friendly. Great functionality!
customer_reviews.author: BobC

customer_reviews.title: Found the product to be very easily installed and the instructions for the installation very easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Found the product to be very easily installed and the instructions for the installation very easy to follow and complete
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. The remote works from a good distance away.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy installation and works like a charm. High marks for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mack

customer_reviews.title: Seems like an okay unit
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an okay unit. However, they did not include the chain master links in the package. Without those you cannot connect the chain. I checked every scrap of packing 5 times... they were not in there. I contacted Chamberlain through their website; no response in a week so far. Shame to have to return it just for two little master links. I guess I'll give them a couple more days then start the return...
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great door opener for the price. Easy installation and to get it operational with clear instructions
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this purchase. The instructions were easy to follow and I was able to get both of my openers on in one day. They both work great and haven't had any issues since installation about a week ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might end up being a costly opener
customer_reviews.text: After installing I found my existing remotes do not work. Seems the new wireless system is not backward compatible which forces one to buy a new outside remote. That along with the requirement to buy the add on extra for an eight foot door makes the opener less than a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 ft doors bought 3
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 ft doors bought 3 ,easy to install ..good value .
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Great engineering NOT
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly detail instructions, follow IKEA they are the leader in communication. Pulley broke and the face plate to the garage door has 2 lag bolts that come loose as it is secured with no fastener? Great engineering NOT! Real cheap junk...Will return and get a Craftsman like I should of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Chamberlain Pd510 Garage Door Opener, ½ Hp, Durable Chain Drive Operation, Includes 1-1 Button Remote, Wall Control Panel
product_meta.description: This garage door opener feature a rugged and reliable 1/2 hp AC motor. The single 100-watt lighting produces enough light to safely move around your garage. The tri-band frequency remote offer better range, performance and less interference. Includes auto force and electronic limits; which make getting your door moving with the press of a button. Designed specifically for 7ft. Sectional doors - extension kits required for 8 ft. And 10 ft. Doors.
feature_bullets: Powerful 1/2 hp motor with a rugged and reliable, industrial strength chain drive
Accessories include 1 pre programmed, 1 button, tri band frequency remote that provides consistent performance over a long range which includes easy push button wall control and safety sensors
Patented security + 2.0 rolling code technology and posilock anti theft protection assures that once the door closes it stays locked
Safety sensors project an invisible beam preventing the garage door from closing on people, pets or other objects
Certain vehicle makes/models may require a compatibility bridge device to operate your garage door opener via the home link buttons; Drive Type: Chain

specifications.Included Components: 1/2HP Motor^Chain Drive^Button visor remote^Multi-function wall control^IR Safety Sensor^
specifications.Warranty Description: 6 year motor warranty and 1 Year Parts/Chain/Accessories Warranty
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
